verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:18
verses.text: And the sons of Kohath were, Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:19
verses.text: The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. And these are the families of the Levites according to their fathers.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:20
verses.text: Of Gershom; Libni his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:21
verses.text: Joah his son, Iddo his son, Zerah his son, Jeaterai his son.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:22
verses.text: The sons of Kohath; Amminadab his son, Korah his son, Assir his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:23
verses.text: Elkanah his son, and Ebiasaph his son, and Assir his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:24
verses.text: Tahath his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah his son, and Shaul his son.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:25
verses.text: And the sons of Elkanah; Amasai, and Ahimoth.
